mapper.select: select org1.id, org1.name, org1.code, org1.type, org1.orderNo, org1.remarks, org1.parentId, org2.name parentName, org1.tenantId from s_org org1 left join s_org org2 on org1.parentId = org2.id where org1.tenantId = #{tenantId} order by orderNo

select org1.id, org1.name, org1.code, org1.type, org1.orderNo, org1.remarks, org1.parentId, org2.name parentName from s_org org1 left join s_org org2 on org1.parentId = org2.id where org1.id = #{id} or org1.parent

select org1.id, org1.name, org1.code, org1.type, org1.orderNo, org1.remarks, org1.parentId, org2.name parentName from s_org org1 left join s_org org2 on org1.parentId = org2.id where org1.parentId = #{parentId} order by orderNo
select IFNULL(max(orderNo), 1) from s_org where parentId = #{parentId}
